messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis, with the assistance of Chauffer Rodney Robinson, rolled the decedent over and placed her in a body bag. Technician Muhammad photographed and collected the spent casing, which was identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger. Sergeant McMullen advised Detective Morton there was a blood trail from the interior hallway to North Derbignay Street. At 2:30AM, Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers conducted a gunshot residue test on both Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor. Coroner's Office Day Records from Detective David Trehan classified the shooting deaths as homicides. Detective Aucoin locked and secured the residence after the investigation and placed a seal from the Orleans Parish Coroner's Office on the door. Detective Morton met with witness, Darceleen Commodore, regarding her encounter with Reynell Payne. Detective Morton arrived at 1820 Tricou and began an on-scene investigation. He met with Sergeant McMullen, who advised him about the deceased, Patrice Commodore. Detective Ryan Aucoin directed the Crime Lab personnel to place evidence markers near the trail of blood. Sergeant Chris Robert manned Unit 520. Officer Juan Lopez manned Unit 1570. Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden manned Unit 507. Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt manned Unit 516. Detective Gregory Johnson manned Unit 546. Detective Jason McGee manned Unit 1571. Detective Ananie Mitchell manned Unit 1574. Detective Melvin McCullum manned Unit 1576. Detective Pratt of the Homicide Section handled the scene on Mazant Street. Detective Mathews compiled photographic line-ups of the suspects. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger sketched the broken piece of doorjamb into the scene sketch.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted by Chauffer Rodney Robinson, rolled the decedent over and placed her in a body bag.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Photographed and collected the spent casing identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Advised Detective Morton of a blood trail leading from the interior hallway to North Derbignay Street.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted a gunshot residue test on the door.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Met with the witness, Darceleen Commodore, about her encounter with Reynell Payne and led the on-scene investigation at
